author: diegolosada
content:
Currently, this is what I think is happening:

`--engine-rpc-http-port` is the port that should be listening on 8551 but it is on 8550.
`--engine-rpc-ws-port` this is the one listening on 8551 (and doesn't accept HTTP requests).

So you should point your CL client to `--engine-rpc-http-port` (except from Nimbus that works on `--engine-rpc-ws-port`)

Anyway, there is a problem with the sync process, it gets stuck at ~55.000.
